website_summaries.verdict: Even though not every purchaser was satisfied with the fit and sizing of the Ryka Terrain, it still earned a considerable number of fans among female wearers. The shoe proved to be a comfortable, stylish, and reasonably-priced choice for daily wear.
pros: A majority of buyers loved how comfortable the Ryka Terrain felt for everyday walking
Many wearers appreciated the lightweight nature of the shoe
The style of the footwear received a lot of positive comments from the users
The price was deemed reasonable by more than a few purchasers
It kept the foot warm during cold weather, according to some people
The model’s construction allowed for an easy on-and-off action
cons: The shoe ran small lengthwise for a good number of testers
they had to go from half-a-size to a full size up in order to achieve the right length
Several reviewers complained that the footwear caused discomfort in the rearfoot because its heel section was placed somewhat low
A few ladies wished that the product offered arch support

customer_reviews.title: I downloaded and printed out a sizing chart from Ryka's website so that I had a better idea of what size to get
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about sizing due to other posts saying that either to go a size up or down. I downloaded and printed out a sizing chart from Ryka's website so that I had a better idea of what size to get; I generally run a 8 1/2 to 9 in a ladies tennis shoe. The shoes I bought fit comfortably and I am taking to wearing them all the time now, I love them. I would definitelty be buying more shies from Ryka.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 1/2 size larger but fit is tight.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 6W. I have not bought RYKA shoes before, so as recommended on reviews I ordered a half size bigger. I decided to try them since I was pleased they offered wide sizes. I ordered 6.5W, and, depending on what socks I wear, they are snug to tight. I wanted them for a winter walking shoe which they are fine for short periods. I do not find them comfortable for an all day, every day day which I would have liked. Shoes are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: upelaine

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is so comfortable! I can walk in these for hours without my feet getting sore. It feels like a tennis shoe on your feet but easy to slip on/off. It's cute too and keeps your feet warm in the winter without getting sweaty. It's not the most stylish shoe, but it's perfect if you need something easy and you're on your feet a lot. It's a little more appropriate in a work setting than a tennis shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Back of heel is lower than expected.
customer_reviews.text: The back of this shoe does not come up as high as a regular shoe, nor is it as low as a slide on. It rubbed the back of my heel, so I'll be returning. They do look really nice, though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel K

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shoes; sizing is small
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my purchase. I normally wear an 8W and I ordered these in an 8.5W. I can wear with thin socks which is fine for me. At first they felt weird because the back of the show is lower on my heal than other shoes I wear but after a couple days of wearing them I LOVE them! I will be buying another pair in brown.
customer_reviews.author: Mgrooms

customer_reviews.title: good shoes
customer_reviews.text: these are great shoes. I have a high instep and may have to snip the elastic on the top a bit for comfort. They were hard to get on the first few times, but have eased up or stretched a bit. They felt fine all day. For my feet, I wish the arch support was a bit higher, but they are really just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Stilley

customer_reviews.title: Slightly irregular sizing.
customer_reviews.text: I love Ryka shoes and normally an 8 fits perfectly. With this style in particular, the right shoe is measurably smaller than the right by a fraction of an inch, and it's both tight in the toe, and the heel hits at just the wrong point on my ankle, but just the right shoe. The shoes themselves seem well made and are really nice, so I'm going to try to go up a half size and hope for a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Another great pair of Ryka!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought many Ryka shoes over the past several years. They are the only sneaker brand for me. They always fit and never disappoint. This particular pair are just a little tighter in the toe box, so take that into account when ordering. Since they’re all suede, I expect that will loosen over time. They are cute and fit well. I bought mostly as house shoes for the colder months, but since my orthotic inserts fit in them I will probably wear out as well!
customer_reviews.author: SueZQ

customer_reviews.title: Arch support
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, had to order a 1/2 size larger just because I know Ryka runs small. Disappointed in the arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Zavala

customer_reviews.title: Best Fit Ever
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this shoe to work where I am on my feet most of the day. I wear compression socks (Dr. Comfort) and was told by my podiatrist to buy a size up in a show and put in an athletic insert. I have been very happy with the shoes and this combination of socks and insoles that get me through the day. I hope you will continue to carry these shoes as I have had my pair for 2 years and they are starting to wear out. I buy a lot of Ryka, but this shoe has been my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda R

customer_reviews.title: Mostly like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn’t like about these shoes is that they are kind of low slung at the heel. I feel like my foot will slide out. It doesn’t but it still feels a little strange. Otherwise the are cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe if you size up
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and comforted shoe, just size up a whole size. I'm normally a size 8 1/2 but sized up to a 9. They were still too small!! I have several other pairs of Ryka which are all size 9 and fit very comfortably, this one did Noland had to be returned. :(
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I had these shoes before and loved them but wanted different colors...they are no longer available
customer_reviews.text: These Ryka Suede slip on shoes "Terraine" fit me perfectly..I wanted to order more and am thankful I found them on Amazing as the original Ryka Company had discontinued them...I searched everywhere to no avail...am glad I found them on your website...I wanted other colors but the Black at least goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but not enough arch support
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Ryka shoes. These were a great fit; not as stylish as I had hoped and even though they are comfy there is not much arch support.
customer_reviews.author: 4Beavs

customer_reviews.title: Fit is comfortable.  I wear only Ryka for over  15 years.  These did not fit at all.
customer_reviews.text: I like the sneaker, nice color and style but walk too small., made my toes feel Pinched, very uncomfortable. I would like a larger size. Very ynice looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Alice C. Craig

customer_reviews.title: These are very comfortable and casual
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and casual. These fit because I bought a whole size larger than I normally wear. They accommodate my orthotic sole inserts nicely. I would prefer a color other than white on the sides of the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Susan H.

customer_reviews.title: They are really nice looking, but the sued front wouldn't have been ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know that it was a clog in the back, but the added wool design around the top of the shoe helps to keep it on. They are really nice looking , but the sued front wouldn't have been acceptable through the summer in the past. That is what attracts us to change.
customer_reviews.author: Kakie

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable and stylish shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these Ryka's..they fit and are very comfortable and look like fall. I wear an 8/12 in Sketchers but these in an 8 are just fine. They were a little tight at first but after wearing them they are now perfect, glad I got the size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Ida M. Eardley

customer_reviews.title: Meets My Needs Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and comfort. Good walking shoe. Even looks good with capris and shorts. 10 1/2 size fits wonderfully, exactly what I was hoping for with plenty of toe box room without being to loose. I think a 10 would have been too small.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen R.

customer_reviews.title: Ryka, my best shoe purchase in 10 years!
customer_reviews.text: Ryka shoes fit me perfectly and were comfortable from the moment I put them on. True to size with plently of room in the toe box and the width is just right. They don't slip and work wearing thin sox or my preference is to wear them with no sox at all. Love the suede and to protect them in wet weather I sprayed them with Camp Dry. I highly recommend Ryka shoes and boots.
customer_reviews.author: Micksnoo

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shoes! I have three pair now. One pair I have worn nearly every day this Summer hiking and working outside on our property. I suffer from plantar fasciitis and these are the most comfortable shoes I've found in years. I wore this pair brand new straight out of the box to a huge outdoor flea market where we walked 6 hrs with no pain or rubbing from them. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Expected more from Ryka
customer_reviews.text: I have always been happy with the Ryka athletic shoes, but this style disappoints... The heel height feels low, after a few weeks of wear. The back always feels like it's slipping a bit. There's not much instep support. The rest of the shoe feels fine, however.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G

customer_reviews.title: Love the easy slip function. they stay on my feet well.
customer_reviews.text: l can't wear any socks since they are snugged fit. Hope you will have a half size larger for the same design. l have to replace the arch supports with stronger ones.
customer_reviews.author: molly,m

customer_reviews.title: Rykas are the only shoe for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure you know that Ryka is the only shoe brand that uses a female lathe to make female peoples shoes. Narrower in the heel and wider in the ball. Suddenly my toes are straightening out.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. I wore them all day the first day and had no problems and my feet felt fine. I also like that the insoles are removable for orthotics. I would recommend buying these shoes and may even buy another pair in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable light weight sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I've never bought Ryka brand shoes before. I can say that these shoes are totally comfy straight from the box. These shoes are designed for a women's foot - at least THIS woman! Great shoe and price.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria E.

customer_reviews.title: Fit fine but need more no-show socks
customer_reviews.text: I guess I have “normal” feet! I ordered my usual size and they are a perfect fit (7.5). I like them. My no-show socks still show, but it’s acceptable to me. If I really wanted, I could just get the EXTRA no-show socks. :p
customer_reviews.author: Smilemz

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of trouble with my feet and legs and these shoes help me walk with less pain and they fit me just right.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Happy until stitching coming undone!
customer_reviews.text: Fine shoe. Not much arch support, but that's par for the course with athletic shoes. Would've rated a 4, but with stitching undoing am sadly looking at the quick demise of a pair of shoes and a sad rating of 1. Have only had it for a little over a month. Maybe I got a dud?
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: The are the most comfortable pair of sneakers that I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: The are the most comfortable pair of sneakers that I have ever worn. I just wish the bottom of the soles were thicker and could last longer. Over very good product.
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Love Rykas
customer_reviews.text: Lovely slipon shoe. Bought to wear through Security on an upcoming trip. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Back of shoe too low on my foot.
customer_reviews.text: The heel did not come up far enough on my foot making it rather uncomfortable with some heel slippage. But it is a very attractive show. I had to return it due to the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Maraposa

customer_reviews.title: Great little run-around shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little run-around shoe for the price. VERY lightweight. Great for running errands, etc. I only wish they were waterproof.... stepped in some slush and my toes got a bit wet. So, not for rain/snow, but a very comfy dry weather shoe.
customer_reviews.author: CE Riley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Bought them to use as a house shoe/slipper and wear them everywhere! On my feet all day at work and they stayed comfortable. I'm going to order more soon! I have a somewhat wide foot and these fit perfectly. Very roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like the slip on style.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice looking, but seems smaller/tighter than a previous gray pair I bought elsewhere in the same size 9 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First try at Ryka sneakers a home run
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty and fit well. Very comfortable. I wear inserts and they fit in the shoe as if they were made for them.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Jane

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! I am a nurse and these shoes are so comfortable. I have purchased four pairs now. I hope they continue making these for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Callison

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to slip on and wear around the house or basic walking & daily errands.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Supportive cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and comfy. I wear often as the supports seems to help with my bad back. I bought another pair in blue as i really like them.
customer_reviews.author: happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love Ryka shoes! They always fit perfect and are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Wide enough for wide foot or high instep.
customer_reviews.author: LaraBNewYork

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. Looks great with my skinny jeans. Some of my leather shoes didn’t look good with those jeans. Love the style and so reasonably priced on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Minnie O

customer_reviews.title: Shoe fit odd on one foot.
customer_reviews.text: The left shoe was cut tight across the instep unevenly.
customer_reviews.author: Laure BRH

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I love these, great walking shoe and comfortable to wear. I have wide feet and these were a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Sabeena

customer_reviews.title: The toe box is noticeably smaller than other Ryka shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm still undecided about this shoe. I have several pairs of Ryka shoes but these don't have the comfort and fit I've grown accustomed to. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is as stylish as it is comfortable. It makes me forget that I have plantar fascitis issues in both feet!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 5 pairs of this particular style shoe. They are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle  Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Just didnt fit well
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. appear to be well constructed, but just did not fit me well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Most of my shoes are Ryka but I was very Dissatisfied with this one.
customer_reviews.text: Not only is one shoe bigger than the other but there is very little arch support. I also expected more padding in the soles. Returned the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Chandy

customer_reviews.title: the wide width fit like medium width
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and I am really glad I got the wide width. I'm somewhere in between medium and wide, depending on the shoe. They don't look or feel wide, so I can imagine the medium width would not have been enough for me. Very lightweight and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Pelaez

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. Love these shoes.They are very comfortable and have lots of cushion. Glad I was able to find a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Confortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Confortable from day one . Light on your feet easy to wear and attractive to look at
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my sister and she loves them - she says that they are the most comfortable shoes she has ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sue Draves

customer_reviews.title: Love the Ryka brand shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the Ryka brand shoes! These shoes are very comfortable and the fit is comparable to other Ryka shoes I've had for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The color will rub off on your feet, on the black pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kari L. Catron

customer_reviews.title: Not pretty but comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Still a little wide for me as my foot slips around when I walk. But they are comfortable on the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Tutor Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Have bought several pair of RYKA shoes because they fit perfect and comfortable walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon K Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with these shoes. They are very comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Smigielski

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable! I have trouble finding shoes that are good for walking and these are perfect. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine M. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I have arthritis on my insteps and I am able to walk without pain.
customer_reviews.author: jhrose

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for the price! Looks great with all blue jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: Love the comfort
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Have three pairs Used for yard work and every day errands...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Style and comfort in one!
customer_reviews.text: I have pain in my feet with most shoes. But not Rykas. I used to buy only Asics. But they started hurting my feet too. Now I've switched to Rykas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Like the look, but it’s a little tight across the top of my foot, which isn’t unusual with my feet. I’ll wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Heel is too low, feels like it wants to come off your foot.
customer_reviews.text: The heel is too low on the back of the foot, feels like it wants to fall off your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Maybe should consider 1/2 size smaller in this style. My other Ryka sneakers fit great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an 8M, but I found this style to be a little to wide for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jacz

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sneaker. It fits perfect and it is comfortable. Also it is a light weight shoe, not heavy. I'm glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Drouin

customer_reviews.title: Comfort is what I love in a shoe. Ryka has  quality & comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Love these Ryka Sneakers. They are very comfortable and just the color I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Legg

customer_reviews.title: Fits as they should
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item on Jan 4 2018 and it arrived at 5PM on Jan 6. My wife is a 8M and it fits just like they should. She really likes these shoes. No problems here. Her first pair she bought from Zoolily and she's had them since fall of 2014. She used them in rain, snow, kids track meets, soccer games, and working in a laboratory. Just buy them already!
customer_reviews.author: Ati S

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, just can’t wear thick socks with these, but really wouldn’t want to.
customer_reviews.author: Traci nixon

customer_reviews.title: 5 and I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I had to get a 9.5 and I love them...now I want another pair in black....
customer_reviews.author: Maddie loves cats and all animals!

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Easy to just slip on and go. Lightweight, super comfy. I'm going to buy a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

product_meta.title: Ryka Womens Terrain Leather Low Top Slip On Fashion Sneakers
product_meta.description: Womens Ryka Terrain :: The perfect combination of foot coverage and ease, the Terrain features a twin gore vamp for easy on/off.
feature_bullets: Suede twin gore upper with heathered flannel comfort collar.
Compression molded EVA midsole for soft cushion.
Features full slip resistant TX rubber coverage for extra traction and durability
